Class StudentApp

  • Object
    • StudentApp

  • public class StudentApp
extends Object
    Interface that a student see after login
  • Functionalities include:
  • 1. Add Course Group
  • 2. Drop Course Group
  • 3. Check/Print Courses Registered
  • 4. Check Vacancies Available
  • 5. Check Index Number of Course
  • 6. Swop Index Number with Another Student
  • 7. Accept Swop Request
  • 8. View Confirmed Time Table
Author:
Wei Yao and Wen Yu

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Starts the App

      • showMenu

        public void showMenu()
        Shows the main menu

      • addMenu

        public void addMenu()
        UI for adding a course
      • 1. Checks if student has exceeded 21 AU
      • 2. Checks if student is already in the course
      • 3. Checks if student is already in the waitlist
      • 4. Checks if student has a clashing time table

  • dropMenu

    public void dropMenu()
    UI for dropping a course. Only shows course groups a student is in
  • If there is another student in waitlist, also add the course to the student and notify them via email

  • dropCourseGroup

    private String dropCourseGroup(String courseGroup)
    Drops course group in both student and the course
    Parameters:
    courseGroup -
    Returns:
    string: matriculation number of waitlist student null: if there is no waitlist student to add

  • printMenu

    public void printMenu()
    UI to print out all registered courses of a student

  • checkVacancies

    public void checkVacancies()
    UI to check vacanies of course groups

  • checkIndex

    public void checkIndex()
    UI to check all indexes of a course

  • swopIndex

    public void swopIndex()
    UI to swop indexes
  • 1. Checks for clashes in both students
  • 2. Checks that both student have the indexes they want to trade

  • acceptSwap

    private void acceptSwap()
    UI to accept swop requests from another student
  • Checks for correct input

  • viewTimetable

    public void viewTimetable()
    UI to view student's timetable

  • isClashing

    private boolean isClashing(String newCourseGroupIndex)
    Check if there are clashes between the current student's timetable and their newly added index
    Parameters:
    newCourseGroupIndex -
    Returns:
    true: there are clashes
  • false: there are no clashes
